languages.text: "Верная слуга Империума, адепт Администратума, магистр исторических записей Эванжелина Айвик. Погибла, задохнувшись".

traits.locale_text: "Верная слуга Империума, адепт Администратума, магистр исторических записей Эванжелина Айвик. Погибла, задохнувшись".

languages.text: "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."
languages.original_text: "Верная слуга Империума, адепт Администратума, магистр исторических записей Эванжелина Айвик. Погибла, задохнувшись".

traits.locale_text: "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."
"Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."

{n}A chittering sound comes out of the first skull's mouth, and a mechanical quill starts flitting back and forth beneath its upper teeth. A minute later, the skull disgorges a long strip of data. The record reads:{/n} "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."

{n}A chittering sound comes out of the first skull's mouth, and a mechanical quill starts flitting back and forth beneath its upper teeth. A minute later, the skull disgorges a long strip of data. The record reads:{/n} "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."
"Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."
"Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."
"Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."

languages.text: 「帝国の忠実なる奉仕者、帝国行政局の専門家、大記録官アヴァンジェリン・アイヴィック。死因：窒息」
languages.original_text: "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."

traits.locale_text: {n}最初のスカルの口からチチチという音が漏れ、上の歯の下で機械仕掛けの羽ペンがせわしなく動き始めた。1分後、スカルは長いデータの帯を吐き出した。記録にはこう書かれていた。{/n}「帝国の忠実なる奉仕者、帝国行政局の専門家、大記録官アヴァンジェリン・アイヴィック。死因：窒息」

languages.text: "Treue Dienerin des Imperiums, Administratum-Adeptin, Großchronistin Avangeline Aivic. Todesursache: Ersticken."
languages.original_text: "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus dem Mund des ersten Schädels ertönt ein klackerndes Geräusch, und eine mechanische Schreibfeder beginnt, zwischen seinen oberen Zähnen hin und her zu flitzen. Eine Minute später würgt der Schädel einen langen Datenstreifen hervor. Darauf steht geschrieben:{/n} "Treue Dienerin des Imperiums, Administratum-Adeptin, Großchronistin Avangeline Aivic. Todesursache: Ersticken."

languages.text: « Avangeline Aivic, grande chroniqueuse, servante loyale de l'Imperium, agente de l'Administratum. Cause du décès : asphyxie. »
languages.original_text: "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le premier crâne émet un cliquetis et une plume mécanique commence à s'agiter entre ses dents. Une minute plus tard, le crâne régurgite une longue bande recouverte de données. Vous y lisez :{/n} « Avangeline Aivic, grande chroniqueuse, servante loyale de l'Imperium, agente de l'Administratum. Cause du décès : asphyxie. »

languages.text: «Fiel sierva del Imperium, adepta del Administratum, gran cronista Avangeline Aivic. Causa de la muerte: asfixia».
languages.original_text: "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."

traits.locale_text: {n}El primer cráneo emite una especie de gorgorito, y una pluma mecánica asoma por debajo de su dentadura superior y empieza a moverse de un lado a otro. Instantes después, el cráneo desembucha una larga tira de papel con datos inscritos. Dice así:{/n} «Fiel sierva del Imperium, adepta del Administratum, gran cronista Avangeline Aivic. Causa de la muerte: asfixia».

languages.text: “帝国忠仆，内政部高阶文员，伟大的编年史学家伊文洁琳·艾维奇。死因：窒息。”
languages.original_text: "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."

traits.locale_text: {n}第一颗头骨口中发出了嘎啦嘎啦的声音，机械羽毛笔在它的上颌附近来回飞舞。一分钟之后，头骨吐出了一张长长的数据单，上面是这样写的。{/n}“帝国忠仆，内政部高阶文员，伟大的编年史学家伊文洁琳·艾维奇。死因：窒息。”

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un sadık hizmetkârı, Administratum üstadı, Büyük Vakanüvis Avangeline Aivic. Ölüm sebebi: Boğulma."
languages.original_text: "Loyal servant of the Imperium, Administratum adept, Grand Chronicler Avangeline Aivic. Cause of death: suffocation."

traits.locale_text: {n}İlk kafatasının ağzından tiz bir ses çıkıyor. Ardından mekanik bir kalem üst dişlerinde ileri geri hareket etmeye başlıyor. Bir dakikanın ardından kafatası uzunca veri şeridini kusuveriyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk'un sadık hizmetkârı, Administratum üstadı, Büyük Vakanüvis Avangeline Aivic. Ölüm sebebi: boğulma."
